tool_description: An API showing all the latest available shopping apps around the world.
title: Top Shopping App

api_list.name: Get Fashion Ideas
api_list.description: Obtain fashions from specific fashion assets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-shopping-app.p.rapidapi.com/ecommerce/{fashionid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-shopping-app.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Obtain All Type Of Fashions
api_list.description: This endpoint will take back all the fashions all around from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-shopping-app.p.rapidapi.com/ecommerce"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-shopping-app.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
